body: They should have a flag button for doujin
Fuck these translations, the worst ive ever seen
Yo, fucking toss this garbage away before it ruins our beloved series that already has a BETTER translation... ffs...

@xanfire I've been complaining about the site since forever. The content is a brainless reupload (i.e. no curation) of everything posted on e-hentai with a more pleasing interface but the tag system is broken, the comments full of zalgo (ex: https://nhentai.net/g/393984/ ), there's a shitload of "low quality" watermarked uploads that are simply worthless (ex: https://nhentai.net/g/394293/ ), a shitload of reposted content and useless uploads like this one, and the list goes on.
There is a frightening similarity with Nico yazawa and Maki nishikino
Imagine getting tilted by a shit upload from a random anon, so they shit talk the site in general. Kek
Did the translator have a stroke or something mid way through
what the fuck is this mess
Ah thanks, I wanted an inferior and objectively wrong translation rather than the good one already available. This website is a joke.
Is this supposed to be some kind of auto-translate performance art or something?  So apparently we get this instead of the side story translated.  Lovely.
